ComicInfo.Summary:
Young Daniel is missing and his mother Lyta is convinced Morpheus has taken the boy. But is he really resting in the arms of the Sandman...or is something far more sinister brewing? Also in this issue, an encounter with Lucifer Morningstar and bad news for Nuala. "The Kindly Ones" part 2.
Lyta Hall is in shock, her son Daniel is missing and the Furies had a message for her. Cluracan has come to the dreaming searching Nuala.
